other_tests.findings: Pericholecystic fluid surrounding the gallbladder; multiple gallstones within the gallbladder; gallbladder wall not thickened and enhances normally post-contrast; cystic change and thickening of the fundus of the gallbladder consistent with adenomyomatosis; no intra or extrahepatic duct dilatation; normal pancreas; peripheral area of wedge-shaped enhancement in segment VII of the liver surrounding a small cyst; multiple subcentimeter T2 hyperintense lesions in the liver; multiple peripelvic and simple cysts within both kidneys; 3.9 cm diverticulum arising from the third part of the duodenum; 0.6 cm lymph node at the porta hepatis and 0.5 cm lymph node adjacent to the falciform ligament; bibasal atelectasis within the lung bases; scoliosis of the upper lumbar spine.
